Member Data Documentation

map< CornerValences ,vector<LoopShellShape*> > voom::LoopShellMesh::_shapes [protected]

Map of shape objects The integer key is the Valence corresponding to a regular or an irregular patch. The value stored is a vector of type Shape*. Each entry of the vector is the shape functions at a quadrature point
